title: Lian Xi (練習)
lyrics: ru guo liu xia duo yi miao zhong ke yi jian shao ming tian xiang ni de tong wo hui yuan yi fang xia suo you jiao huan ren he yi si si ke neng de zhan you xing fu zhi sheng yi bei sha lou yan zheng zheng kan zhuo yi mu mu tian mi bu hui zai you yuan ben ping fan wu qi de yong you dao xian zai jing xiang shi wu zhu de she qiu wo yi kai shi lian xi kai shi man man zhuo ji zhuo ji zhe shi jie mei you ni yi jing he yan lei shuo hao bu ku qi dan dao shu ji shi de ai gai zen me ji xu wo tian tian lian xi tian tian du hui shu xi zai mei you ni de cheng shi li shi zhuo shan chu mei ge liang ren shi jie li na xie zeng jing gong tong yong you de yi qie mei hao he hui yi ai shi yi wan gong qing de sen lin mi liao lu de que shi wo he ni bu shi shuo hao yi qi chuang chu qu zen neng sheng wo yi ren hui qu hui qu
